remarks: A member of the domain of the greatest lower bound function is a subset of the base set.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
statement:
glbs.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
glbs.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
glbs.g $e |- G = ( glb ` K ) $.
glbs.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
glbs.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. dom G ) $.
glbelss $p |- ( ph -> S C_ B ) $.
